body:
$AAPL 
🍏
3 Stocks That Could Be Worth More Than Apple by 2035. 

The tech giant generated a whopping $365.8 billion in revenue in fiscal 2021, an increase of 33% over the prior year. The fact that Apple is growing at an eye-popping pace despite being a mega-cap company is impressive, but it's not surprising as its products and services are in great demand. More importantly, Apple isn't resting on its laurels and is looking to push the envelope by seizing emerging tech trends and moving into new markets.

*Amazon's strong position in cloud computing and e-commerce could help it grow bigger than Apple.

https://www.fool.com/investing/2021/12/18/stocks-that-could-be-worth-more-than-apple-2035/

Apple Stock (AAPL): $210 Price Target From BofA
By Amit Chowdhry ● Today at 8:26 AM. 

* The shares of Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) have received a price target of $210 from BofA. These are the details.
The shares of Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) have received a price target of $210 from BofA. And BofA analyst Wamsi Mohan upgraded Apple to a “Buy” rating from a “Neutral” rating while increasing the price target from $160.
